description: i tried doing so many things to install the lite version. I could not download it in ubuntu 19.10. I hope there does not come a time where i need to change my OS to Windows.

did not detect graphic card, runs in OpenGL.
did not play the video wen imported
summary: major errors, needs to be fixed

description:
as an editor (using the windows ver) its as good as it gets. feature rich 9 which also makes is a little complex to get to grips with)
The only downside (and what a down side!!) is the LACK OF CODECS in the Linux version.. no MP3 really...come on Black Magic,
summary: brillian editor - marked lack of codecs (?)

description: It took a while to install, showed the welcome screen, then didn't open.
Welcome screen appears but nothing else.
